EnableViewmodelHands.title: Enable Viewmodel Hands
EnableViewmodelHands.tooltip: Adds a hand model to every tool/item you can pick up.

EnableHeadBob.title: Enable Head Bobbing
EnableHeadBob.tooltip: Makes the camera bob while you're moving.

HeadBobStrength.title: Head Bob Strength
HeadBobStrength.tooltip: The strength of the Head Bob effect.

EnableHandBob.title: Enable Hand Bobbing
EnableHandBob.tooltip: Makes your hand bob while you're moving and holding a tool/item.

HandBobStrength.title: Tool Bob Strength
HandBobStrength.tooltip: The strength of the Hand Bob effect.

EnableHandHeightOffset.title: Enable Hand Height Offset
EnableHandHeightOffset.tooltip: Makes your hand move up/down while holding a tool/item based on how far up/down you are looking.

HandHeightOffsetStrength.title: Hand Height Offset Strength
HandHeightOffsetStrength.tooltip: The strength of the Hand Height Offset effect.

EnableHandSway.title: Enable Hand Sway
EnableHandSway.tooltip: Makes your hand lag behind the camera as you look around while holding a tool/item.

HandSwayStrength.title: Tool Sway Strength
HandSwayStrength.tooltip: The strength of the Hand Sway effect.

EnableBreathingAnim.title: Enable Breathing Animation
EnableBreathingAnim.tooltip: Makes the tool move very subtley while you're standing still.

BreathingAnimStrength.title: Breathing Animation Strength
BreathingAnimStrength.tooltip: The strength of the breathing effect.

EnableScoutAnim.title: Enable Scout Launcher Fire Animation
EnableScoutAnim.tooltip: Makes the camera and scout launcher recoil when you launch a scout.

EnableLandingAnim.title: Enable Landing Animation
EnableLandingAnim.tooltip: Makes the camera move downward a bit when you land with some speed.

EnableSprintingAnim.title: Enable Sprinting Animation
EnableSprintingAnim.tooltip: (REQUIRES HIKER'S MOD) Makes the tool move downward while you're sprinting.

FixHandClipping.title: Fix Hand Clipping
FixHandClipping.tooltip: Changes the camera's near clip plane to prevent held items and viewmodel arms from clipping into the camera. May cause other less noticeable visual bugs.

HideStowedItems.title: Hide Stowed Items
HideStowedItems.tooltip: Makes held items move fully offscreen when they are stowed (i.e. while piloting the ship, roasting marshmallows, or holding another tool).
